channel.title: Human-Mosquito Interaction Project
channel.description: Recent content on Human-Mosquito Interaction Project

item.title: 'Mosquitoes are an excellent source of information about the people they bite,' explains Federica Lucati
item.description: This post is also published on the Mosquito Alert blog. Today we meet Federica Lucati. She has a degree in Natural Sciences from the University of Padua (Italy) and a Master’s in Natural Sciences.

item.title: Reconstructing human-mosquito interactions at the Marimurtra Botanical Garden
item.description: This post is also published on the Mosquito Alert blog. On Saturday June 12, the Mosquito Alert team carried out an activity in the idyllic Marimurtra Botanical Garden in Blanes.

item.title: Alex Richter-Boix
item.description: Alex Richter-Boix is a Postdoc and scientist communication technician at the University Pompeu Fabra (UPF, Barcelona) participating in the Human-Mosquito Interaction Project (H-MIP) funded by the European Research Council.

item.title: ¡Gracias! Gràcies! Thank you!
item.description: ¿Conoces a alguien que use Mosquito Alert? Por favor comparte el link del cuestionario. Coneixes algú que utilitzi Mosquito Alert?
